name: Wraith (VR)
description:
DUALSHOCK®4 Support Available Soon!

Wraith is an action-packed survival shooter. Take on increasingly deadly enemies using an arsenal of weapons, a real-time marketplace to purchase them along with ammo, upgrades and more.

Challenge yourself or your friends in trying to survive as long as possible in this deadly VR shooter. The game features 4 maps, including:
- The Camp
- The Path
- Sunset
- Blizzard

These maps are designed to change over time as they get darker, it becomes harder to see, the fog takes over and the Wraith achieve an advantage.

Use the in-game real-time marketplace to purchase weapons, ammo and upgrades strategically and on-the-go. Manage your cash earned through kills and equip yourself with the weapons and tools best suited to your playstyle.

Weapons available:
- Beretta M9
- Magnum Revolver
- Sawed-Off Shotgun
- Mini Uzi

PlayStation®VR Aim Controller Expansion (Included):
Weapons:
- AS-Val
- Pump Shotgun
- Double Barrel Shotgun
- HK416

How long can you survive?



1 player
3GB minimum save size
PlayStation®VR Required
PlayStation®Camera Required
2 PS®Move controllers required
Enhanced play with 1 PS VR Aim controller
